results.title: Confessions of a Headhunter
results.creator_credit: Sally Riley, Archie Weller and Scarlett Pictures
results.brief_description: In the film, two Noongar men – Frank and Vinnie – travel across the country and seek revenge for the repeated beheading of the statue of their ancestor warrior Yagan.

constellations_other.name: Laughing in the face of adversity
constellations_other.description: Comedy has been used by First Nations storytellers as a tool for social change. On our screens, humour invites audiences to engage with stories and prompts them to grapple with ideas that they otherwise might shy away from.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Sally Riley, Archie Weller and Scarlett Pictures
results.description: In the film, two Noongar men – Frank and Vinnie – travel across the country and seek revenge for the repeated beheading of the statue of their ancestor warrior Yagan.

results.title: Coherence
results.brief_description: On the night of an astronomical anomaly, eight friends at a dinner party experience a troubling chain of reality bending events.
results.description: On the night of an astronomical anomaly, eight friends at a dinner party experience a troubling chain of reality bending events.
description_for_label: On the night of an astronomical anomaly, eight friends at a dinner party experience a troubling chain of reality bending events.

results.title: Clueless
results.creator_credit: Paramount, Robert Lawrence, Amy Heckerling, Steven J. Jordan, Mona May and Scott Rudin
results.brief_description: Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school’s pecking scale. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first coaxes two teachers into dating each other. Emboldened by her success, she decides to give hopelessly klutzy new student Tai a makeover.

constellations_other.name: Horror movie right there on my TV
constellations_other.description: The colourful and quirky music video for Skyhooks’ song 'Horror Movie' helped propel them to number one, making it their biggest hit.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Paramount, Robert Lawrence, Amy Heckerling, Steven J. Jordan, Mona May and Scott Rudin
results.description: Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school’s pecking scale. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first coaxes two teachers into dating each other. Emboldened by her success, she decides to give hopelessly klutzy new student Tai a makeover. When Tai becomes more popular than she is, Cher realizes that her disapproving ex-stepbrother was right about how misguided she was — and falls for him.
description_for_label: Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school’s pecking scale. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first coaxes two teachers into dating each other. Emboldened by her success, she decides to give hopelessly klutzy new student Tai a makeover. When Tai becomes more popular than she is, Cher realizes that her disapproving ex-stepbrother was right about how misguided she was — and falls for him.

results.title: Cloverfield
results.brief_description: Five young New Yorkers throw their friend a going-away party the night that a monster the size of a skyscraper descends upon the city. Told from the point of view of their video camera, the film is a document of their attempt to survive the most surreal, horrifying event of their lives.
results.description: Five young New Yorkers throw their friend a going-away party the night that a monster the size of a skyscraper descends upon the city. Told from the point of view of their video camera, the film is a document of their attempt to survive the most surreal, horrifying event of their lives.

Told from the point of view of their video camera, the film is a document of their attempt to survive the most surreal, horrifying event of their lives.

results.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
results.brief_description: After an encounter with UFOs, a line worker feels undeniably drawn to an isolated area in the wilderness where something spectacular is about to happen.

constellations_other.name: The Kubrick connection
constellations_other.description: The visual effects for Blade Runner drew on a number of techniques from other iconic films, including two of Stanley Kubrick's masterpieces.

results.description: After an encounter with UFOs, a line worker feels undeniably drawn to an isolated area in the wilderness where something spectacular is about to happen.
description_for_label: After an encounter with UFOs, a line worker feels undeniably drawn to an isolated area in the wilderness where something spectacular is about to happen.

creators_other.name: Julia Phillips and Michael Phillips Productions

results.title: Close-Up
results.brief_description: This fiction-documentary hybrid uses a sensational real-life event—the arrest of a young man on charges that he fraudulently impersonated the well-known filmmaker Mohsen Makhmalbaf—as the basis for a stunning, multilayered investigation into movies, identity, artistic creation, and existence, in which the real people from the case play themselves.
results.description: This fiction-documentary hybrid uses a sensational real-life event—the arrest of a young man on charges that he fraudulently impersonated the well-known filmmaker Mohsen Makhmalbaf—as the basis for a stunning, multilayered investigation into movies, identity, artistic creation, and existence, in which the real people from the case play themselves.
description_for_label: This fiction-documentary hybrid uses a sensational real-life event—the arrest of a young man on charges that he fraudulently impersonated the well-known filmmaker Mohsen Makhmalbaf—as the basis for a stunning, multilayered investigation into movies, identity, artistic creation, and existence, in which the real people from the case play themselves.

results.title: Climate Change: The Facts
results.creator_credit: BBC Studios, IWC Media and Serena Davies
results.brief_description: After one of the hottest years on record, Sir David Attenborough looks at the science of climate change and potential solutions to this global threat. Interviews with some of the world’s leading climate scientists explore recent extreme weather conditions such as unprecedented storms and catastrophic wildfires. They also reveal what dangerous levels of climate change could mean for both human populations and the natural world in the future.
results.creator_credit_for_label: BBC Studios, IWC Media and Serena Davies
results.description: After one of the hottest years on record, Sir David Attenborough looks at the science of climate change and potential solutions to this global threat. Interviews with some of the world’s leading climate scientists explore recent extreme weather conditions such as unprecedented storms and catastrophic wildfires. They also reveal what dangerous levels of climate change could mean for both human populations and the natural world in the future.

results.title: Cleverman
results.creator_credit: ABC-TV (Australia), Ryan Griffen, Jacob Nash, Damir Peranovic, Pukeko Pictures and Goalpost Pictures
results.brief_description: Cleverman stormed onto ABC TV in 2016 as a dystopian sci-fi with a difference. With predominantly Indigenous cast and senior crew, the series explores a series of Aboriginal origin stories in a contemporary context, with political nuance touching on themes of class, racism and power.

constellations_other.name: Alternate histories and futures
constellations_other.description: Sue Ford's Egami reimagines contemporary life through a feminist and colonial lens.

constellations_other.name: Evil AI, dystopias and production design
constellations_other.description: In No Code’s sci-fi thriller players take command of a multi-national space station’s artificial intelligence system to help the sole survivor solve the mystery of a missing crew and why the station is wildly off course.

constellations_other.name: Jedda: Uneven ground, the road to on-screen diversity
constellations_other.description: Jedda was the first fully funded Australian feature to be shot on colour film. It was also the first Australian film with Aboriginal actors in lead roles, however, it reflects a deeply problematic time in Australian history.

constellations_other.name: Canopy
constellations_other.description: John Harvey is a Torres Strait Islander producer, director and writer in screen and stage whose work Canopy celebrates Indigenous self-representation.

constellations_other.name: Rachel Perkins
constellations_other.description: The moving image has helped tell First Peoples stories through documentary, films and TV shows, with acclaimed director, producer and screenwriter Rachel Perkins contributing significantly to these stories.

results.creator_credit_for_label: ABC-TV (Australia), Ryan Griffen, Jacob Nash, Damir Peranovic, Pukeko Pictures and Goalpost Pictures
results.description:
Cleverman stormed onto ABC TV in 2016 as a dystopian sci-fi with a difference. With predominantly Indigenous cast and senior crew, the series explores a series of Aboriginal origin stories in a contemporary context, with political nuance touching on themes of class, racism and power.

Exploring First Peoples storytelling, language and creativity in production design, costumes and props, this free exhibition invites you to listen-first and immerse yourself in a powerful and contemporary expression of origin stories.

In late December 2018 until April 2019, we staged an exhibition on Cleverman that explored the making of the TV series, and including props, costumes and make-up, designs by Weta Workshop and artwork from the original comic book series.

The exhibition was co-curated by Cleverman concept creator Ryan Griffen and production designer Jacob Nash. Exhibition research partners Prof. Angela Ndalianis and Dr Liam Burke, Swinburne University of Technology.
description_for_label:
Cleverman stormed onto ABC TV in 2016 as a dystopian sci-fi with a difference. With predominantly Indigenous cast and senior crew, the series explores a series of Aboriginal origin stories in a contemporary context, with political nuance touching on themes of class, racism and power.

Exploring First Peoples storytelling, language and creativity in production design, costumes and props, this free exhibition invites you to listen-first and immerse yourself in a powerful and contemporary expression of origin stories.

In late December 2018 until April 2019, we staged an exhibition on Cleverman that explored the making of the TV series, and including props, costumes and make-up, designs by Weta Workshop and artwork from the original comic book series.

The exhibition was co-curated by Cleverman concept creator Ryan Griffen and production designer Jacob Nash. Exhibition research partners Prof. Angela Ndalianis and Dr Liam Burke, Swinburne University of Technology.

results.title: Cléo from 5 to 7
results.creator_credit: Ciné Tamaris, Rome Paris Films, Agnès Varda, Bernard Evein, Carlo Ponti, Georges de Beauregard and Alyette Samazeuilh
results.brief_description: Agnès Varda eloquently captures Paris in the sixties with this real-time portrait of a singer set adrift in the city as she awaits test results of a biopsy. A chronicle of the minutes of one woman’s life, Cléo from 5 to 7 is a spirited mix of vivid vérité and melodrama, featuring a score by Michel Legrand and cameos by Jean-Luc Godard and Anna Karina.

constellations_other.name: All about Agnes
constellations_other.description: Belgian director Agnes Varda was the only female director in the French New Wave movement and is known for her long career across influential documentary and dramas, and for her trademark humour, curiosity and insight.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Ciné Tamaris, Rome Paris Films, Agnès Varda, Bernard Evein, Carlo Ponti, Georges de Beauregard and Alyette Samazeuilh
results.description: Agnès Varda eloquently captures Paris in the sixties with this real-time portrait of a singer set adrift in the city as she awaits test results of a biopsy. A chronicle of the minutes of one woman’s life, Cléo from 5 to 7 is a spirited mix of vivid vérité and melodrama, featuring a score by Michel Legrand and cameos by Jean-Luc Godard and Anna Karina.

results.title: City of Ghosts
results.creator_credit: Our Time Projects and Matthew Heineman
results.brief_description: With unprecedented access, this documentary follows the extraordinary journey of “Raqqa is Being Slaughtered Silently”—a group of anonymous citizen journalists who banded together after their homeland was overtaken by ISIS—as they risk their lives to stand up against one of the greatest evils in the world today.

constellations_other.name: Cities under siege
constellations_other.description: The Syrian Civil War is an ongoing conflict that is arguably the most documented in history, with images and videos captured by journalists, activists, combatants and victims.

results.description: With unprecedented access, this documentary follows the extraordinary journey of “Raqqa is Being Slaughtered Silently”—a group of anonymous citizen journalists who banded together after their homeland was overtaken by ISIS—as they risk their lives to stand up against one of the greatest evils in the world today.
